Description: Job Title: **Cashier and Sales Person**Company: **Al Reem Henna and Beauty Salon**Location: **Dibba-Fujairah, United Arab Emirates**Salary: **Up to AED 2000****About Us:**We are a well-established women's Henna and Beauty Salon in Dibba-Fujairah. We pride ourselves on providing top-notch beauty services to our clients, with a strong emphasis on excellent customer service. We are looking for an experienced and dedicated Cashier and Sales Person to join our team.**Position Overview:**As a Cashier and Sales Person, you will be responsible for handling all cash transactions, providing exceptional customer service, and promoting our range of beauty services and products. The ideal candidate will have a strong sales background and experience in the beauty industry, as well as the ability to communicate effectively with customers.**Responsibilities:*** Handle cash transactions using our point-of-sale system, including processing payments, issuing receipts, and maintaining accurate records of transactions* Greet customers as they enter the salon and provide information on our services and products* Assist customers in making informed choices about our products and services* Keep up-to-date with the latest beauty trends and promote our range of services and products* Maintain a clean and organized workspace and sales area* Resolve customer complaints and inquiries in a professional and courteous manner* Work closely with other team members to ensure a smooth flow of operations and a high level of customer satisfaction* Report any issues or discrepancies to the management* Perform other duties as assigned by the management**Requirements:*** A minimum of 2 years of experience in sales, preferably in the beauty industry* Relevant experience in sales from industries such as catering, supermarket sales, or other retail settings will also be considered.* Basic to fluent Arabic language skills* Strong interpersonal and communication skills* Excellent customer service skills and a positive attitude* Must be organized, detail-oriented, and able to multitask* Knowledge of beauty products and services is a plus* Must be a Philippine national**Benefits:*** Competitive salary and incentives* Opportunities for professional growth and development* Employee discount on products and services* Supportive and inclusive work environmentSkills
